name: The Crime Suspect
description:
Now download Crime Suspect and get solve secret hidden story!

Get involved in this great Point and Click and solve the Crime Case!

Some great features:
- Explore through the atmosphere of mystery
- Captivating detective 24 story hidden
- A wide variety of objects to search and puzzles to solve
- Help your detective click on hint button
- This game works in offline mode without Internet
- Unlimited hints
- Most amazing level and ultimate hidden spot and object
- Find yourself in the world of pure madness!
- Never-ending mystic game play
- Incredible graphics
